forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 55 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 2 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 47. Northwest wind 6 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph.

weather_report:
As the morning sun graces Downtown San Francisco, today unfolds with clear skies and a gentle bountiful warmth. The fresh air carries the promise of a pleasant day, with temperatures gradually shifting from the refreshing 60 degrees toward a cooler 55 in the afternoon. Winds from the south southwest playfully dance around, bringing with them the lilt of a lively breeze, while gusts remind us of the city’s spirited personality. In the twilight hours, a soft veil of clouds will embrace the night, descending into the crisp ambiance with temperatures dipping to around 47.

Given the clarity and mildness of the day, light layers would be your companion; perhaps a cozy cardigan over a shirt to navigate the coolness that lingers in the afternoon and evening air. Today invites gentle strolls—explore the lesser-known streets of the city, meander through the serene landscapes of Golden Gate Park, or reflect on the day while sipping a warm cup of coffee at a quaint café. A sculpture garden or outdoor exhibit would capture the essence of this vibrant day, enhancing the joy of experiencing the city’s hustle and artistic heart, all under the serene Californian sun.
